A big improvement needs in this section if Moto wants to go ahead with this series. Sound quality is good in the speakers, if you have a good headset/headphone, it does pretty good. Default Moto headsets provided are waste. Display is crisp and clear. Touch is responsive but again sometimes lagging interferes. Rear and Front CAM quality is pretty nice. Pic editing options are nice. You can also download Google Cam app for better enhancements. Call quality is good. Till now I didn't found any call drops. No extra bloatware. We are one of the devices to taste Lollipop early.. whoo whooo...\m/ So overall a very good product.. Carefully designed.. Scores well in both looks and performance..
